FYI https://www.propublica.org/article/va-shadow-rulers-program-is-trending-towards-red. I wasn't particularly going to comment, but this is a gem:

“For decades the federal government has struggled to accomplish something that should be very, very simple,” Trump said on June 5, 2017. “I’m very proud to say that we are finally taking steps to solve this situation once and for all. … No more complications

Where the thing that should be accomplished is "standardizing how doctors treat a given condition, giving them access to patients’ full medical history, and assisting them with big-data insights from across the entire system"
